subject: SCP-002
summary: SCP-002 is a large, spherical object that appears to be a small room. It is capable of generating furniture and objects based on the living humans present.
containment: SCP-002 is to be kept in a standard containment chamber with no less than two armed guards on duty at all times.

subject: SCP-003
summary: SCP-003 is a sentient entity that can manipulate the emotions of individuals within a 10-meter radius.
containment: SCP-003 must be contained in a soundproof, airtight chamber. Interaction is restricted to approved personnel only.

subject: SCP-004
summary: SCP-004 is a large, multi-limbed creature that exhibits high levels of aggression and unpredictable behavior.
containment: SCP-004 is to be contained in a reinforced containment cell with a minimum of five layers of security.

subject: SCP-005
summary: SCP-005 was an object that caused spontaneous combustion in organic matter within a radius of 5 meters.
containment: SCP-005 should be kept in a fire-resistant containment box with an automated fire suppression system.

subject: SCP-006
summary: SCP-006 is an artifact that has shown potential for assisting in the containment of other SCPs.
containment: SCP-006 is to be stored in a standard containment unit with restricted access.
